paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Client-Focused Representation
detailsData.content: Specializing in representing injured workers in workers' compensation claims and disabled individuals in Social Security Disability claims.

detailsData.title: Certified Specialists
detailsData.content: Both partners are recognized as experts in the field of workers' compensation law by the State Bar of California.

detailsData.title: Extensive Trial Experience
detailsData.content: Having taken over 500 cases to trial, they are among the most experienced trial lawyers in Santa Clara County.

subHeading: Specializing in Workers' Compensation and Social Security Disability Claims
valueProp: Our law firm is client-focused, specializing in representing injured workers in workers’ compensation claims and disabled individuals in Social Security Disability claims.
CTA: How can we help you? We want you to win your case.
